Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2009 06:11PM kimmy62 wrote: Wish I could go down a smaller size too but hips and thighs too big.  Do you think losing weight will help this problem?  Do you have swelling in your abdominal area?  Mine comes and goes.  Also, do you wear a binder?  Thanks...just trying to see how "normal" i am.  Kim
Posts.Title: pants don't fit right! kimmy62 Deb_62

Posts.Content: kimmy62 wrote: I had my TRAM surgery in April and was in a abdominal binder until last month.  I wear a girdle now for support.  My pants do not fit the same since I don't wear the binder any longer.  It seems like my pants or jeans start falling down and bagging up around the crotch.  It is a lovely site!  Has anyone else experienced this?  Anything besides wearing a belt help?  Thanks kim Log in to post a reply
